field.value: Specific Generic Components Are Registered Incorrectly via Fluent Registration

field.name: description
field.value:
There is a note in ServiceDescriptor.cs(57) about a CLR bug with GetInterfaces() and some code to work around the bug. The workaround breaks the scenario where I register a component CustomerRepository : IRepository<ICustomer> and I then try to resolve IRepository<ICustomer>.
More information on the CLR bug would be helpful. I've attached a patch that includes a unit test for the above scenario. The only way for it to work is to comment out the workaround code in ServiceDescriptor.FirstInterface.
